import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; import LiveData from './components/LiveData'; import ChartData from './components/ChartData'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { ReservoirFormat } from './Constants'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import 'react-bootstrap-range-slider/dist/react-bootstrap-range-slider.css'; import RangeSlider from 'react-bootstrap-range-slider'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap'; import waterPlant from './images/watering-plants.png'; function App() { const [reservoir, setReservoir] = useState(0.0); const [threshold, setThreshold] = useState(0.0); const [autoVolume, setAutoVolume] = useState(0.0); const [manualVolume, setManualVolume] = useState(0.0); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const getReservoir = (data) => { setReservoir(data) } const volumeToSeconds = (volume) => { return volume / 30; } const manualWater = () => { setLoading(true) fetch( `http://192.168.68.61:8087/manual_water_plant`, { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ "volume": manualVolume }) } ) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { if (data.status === "success") { setLoading(false) } }) } return (
Reservoir

Water Level

{ReservoirFormat(reservoir)} %
Settings
Auto-Watering
Moisture Threshold (%) {/* */} setThreshold(changeEvent.target.value)} /> setThreshold(changeEvent.target.value)} /> Volume (ml) {/* */} setAutoVolume(changeEvent.target.value)} min={50} max={300} /> setAutoVolume(changeEvent.target.value)} /> On/Off
Manual-Watering
Volume (ml) {/* */} setManualVolume(changeEvent.target.value)} /> setManualVolume(changeEvent.target.value)} />
); } export default App;
